position: Associate, Client Services at AlphaSights | Connecting our clients with expert knowledge.

experience.title: Associate
experience.description: Founded in 2008, AlphaSights is the global leader in knowledge on-demand. We connect investors and business leaders with the knowledge they need to succeed. Working from nine cities globally, our 1500+ colleagues provide round-the-clock coverage to the world’s top investment funds, consultancies, and Fortune 500s. Learn more about us at alphasights.com.

positions.subtitle: Michael Page
positions.description: Michael Page is one of the world's leading professional recruitment consultancies. We deliver tailored recruitment solutions to job seekers and a broad range of blue chip employers across 36 countries worldwide.In my role I utilise industry expertise to effectively understand the needs of my clients in the Asset Management, Private Equity, Investment Banking, Consulting, Venture Capital, Public Markets and Corporate Strategy space and successfully match those to the needs of individuals seeking their next career move.If you're looking for a mid-senior level role in any of these sectors, feel free to reach out on ziyaspringwala@michaelpage.co.in
positions.title: Associate Consultant - PE/ VC, Investment Banking, Strategy & Consulting, Public Markets & AMC
positions.description_html:
Michael Page is one of the world's leading professional recruitment consultancies. We deliver tailored recruitment solutions to job seekers and a broad range of blue chip employers across 36 countries worldwide.

In my role I utilise industry expertise to effectively understand the needs of my clients in the Asset Management, Private Equity, Investment Banking, Consulting, Venture Capital, Public Markets and Corporate Strategy space and successfully match those to the needs of individuals seeking their next career move.

If you're looking for a mid-senior level role in any of these sectors, feel free to reach out on ziyaspringwala@michaelpage.co.in

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: Rotational 7-week internship at multiple supply chain logistic companies enabling the development of communicational and analytical skills through challenging tasks.
